com.btilm305.clashapi

Interface ClanLocation


  • public interface ClanLocation
    A representation of a location used in game. API calls for leaderboard information require a location as a parameter. If the location is not a country, getCountryCode() will return null

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getCountryCode()
      Returns the country code of a location
      int getId()
      Returns the id of the location
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the location
      boolean isCountry()
      Returns whether the location is a country

    • Method Detail

      • getCountryCode

        java.lang.String getCountryCode()
        Returns the country code of a location
        Returns:
        the country code, or null if the location is not a country

      • getId

        int getId()
        Returns the id of the location
        Returns:
        the id of the location

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the location
        Returns:
        the name of the location

      • isCountry

        boolean isCountry()
        Returns whether the location is a country
        Returns:
        true if the location is a country, false otherwise
